content.query:
select 
count(*)
from [dbo.].[Insurance_Customer] a 
join [dbo.].[Insurance_Premium] b on a.Customer_ID = b.Customer_id
join [dbo.].[Insurance_Claims] c on a.Customer_id = c.Customer_id and b.Customer_id = c.Customer_id 

select count(*) from  [dbo.].[Insurance_Customer] a ---1250
select count(*) from  [dbo.].[Insurance_Claims] a ---10000 
select count(*) from  [dbo.].[Insurance_Premium] a  -----10000


select count(*) from [dbo].[Insurance_Data]

select count(*) from [dbo].[Insurance_Data_Premium]
where customer_id = '1670267934'


Truncate table [dbo.].[Insurance_Claims]
